title: **WTB t206 NYA Lake for back run**

posts.post_title: **WTB t206 NYA Lake for back run**
posts.post_content:
I'm trying to put together a backrun of New York American "Joe Lake ". This is what I have so far......

Hindu ……….……. brown back
Sovereign ….….. 150/25
Piedmont …….… 350/25
Piedmont …….… 150/25
Sweet Caporal .. 150/25
Sweet Caporal .. 150/649
Sweet Caporal .. 350/30

Any help from board members would be appreciated !!!
